== Installation ==

{{{
tar -zxvf apsh-0.2.tar.gz
cd apsh-0.2
sudo ./install.sh
}}}

== Config File ==

The config file is located:
{{{
/etc/apsh/nodes.tab
}}}

Format is:
(Note the leading and trailing : )
{{{
:nodename:username:comma,separated,groupnames:
}}}

== Usage ==

General
{{{
apsh all uptime
}}}

Multiple nodes and groups
{{{
apsh group1,group2,node1,node2 uptime
}}}

Exclude a node
{{{
apsh group1,-node1 uptime
}}}

Exclude a group
{{{
apsh all,-group1 uptime
}}}

Run a series of commands
{{{
apsh all 'update;date'
}}}
or
{{{
apsh all "update;date"
}}}

Run local script
{{{
apsh all "<./local_script.sh"
}}}
